thread.title: Treasury Secretary John Fraser reignites call for industrial relations, tax reform
thread.title_full: Treasury Secretary John Fraser reignites call for industrial relations, tax reform

title: Treasury Secretary John Fraser reignites call for industrial relations, tax reform
text:
Topix › Pacific Travel › Treasury Secretary John Fraser reigni... Treasury Secretary John Fraser reignites call for industrial relations, tax reform 3 hrs ago Read more: Sydney Morning Herald 
Declaring Australia "overly complacent" and warning that his remarks could cause trouble, the head of the treasury has called for a fresh wave of industrial relations reform, for spending cuts deep enough to slash income tax and for land tax as a replacement for stamp duty. Commemorating six months in the job by speaking to the Australian Conference of Economists in Brisbane, treasury secretary John Fraser said neither China nor Greece posed a significant threat to Australia's outlook . Start the conversation, or Read more at Sydney Morning Herald.
